TopicTitle: Unidentified Flying Object follows me into space

Articles.Content:
[![cVoNNkLh.png](http://i.imgur.com/cVoNNkLh.png)](http://imgur.com/cVoNNkL)

has somebody seen this object ( the one in the red square without the square)? it start to follow me into space, it appears like the launchclamps every x-meter ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

The Kraken is simply watching you to see if you are suitable prey.

But on a more serious note, what mods do you have installed?

It reminds me of the shell that's used to render the atmospheric haze. 

Maybe it's an EVE issue or Planetshine. (not sure if Planetshine actually modifies the appearance of the atmosphere though....)

Also have you made any changes as to what graphics drivers are in use? (Forced DX 11 or OpenGL, etc)

> 
> WANTED: Schroedingers Cat! Dead and Alive..

You literally have the best signature ever.
btw... it is Distant Object Enhancement ...
